title: Forum Account Level?
body: I can't post hardly anywhere on the Forums here because it says I'm Level 5?  In game I've reached Level 12.  Is there a separate level for the Forums, or have I missed something?

replies.body: Your forum level is directly tied to your Summoner level on the client. Sometimes it can take a bit for those levels to sync up with each other, which is why it wasn't letting you post anywhere other than H&S. Once you made this post, it forced your levels to sync up with each other and it looks like you're showing up as level 11 for me now!
